digital image stabilization:
Take crisp, clear pictures with high sensitivity and
fast shutter speeds. Digital Image Stabilization Mode frees your shots
from blurs occasionally caused by camera shake or moving subjects.
face detection:
Face Detection automatically identifies facial features within the frame,
and determines optimum focus and exposure settings in real time for sharp,
brilliant portrait pictures.
